episodes.title: Is Scientology Responsible for My Arrest? I Spent 16 Hrs in Jail for a Minor MJ Possession Charge
episodes.description:
Perhaps I'm paranoid, but I'd like for YOU to be the judge of that. After I flew back to protest the Scientology Ideal Org in Chicago, where one of the cronies said I had non existent warrants out for my arrest, I was booked in suburban Atlanta (Cobb County), where I spent 16 hours in the can for a misdemeanor possession charge, due to being found smoking cannabis in the parking lot of my hotel. The strange thing is, the Cobb County Sheriff announced in 2019 that they're no longer arresting people for marijuana possession under an ounce. I had a quarter ounce. Scientology has an ideal org in Atlanta and a strong relationship with the police. So, watch the video and tell me your opinion. Am I going insane or is this whole deal worth investigating?
GOFUNDME: https://gofund.me/a7d2d653

episodes.title: More Scientology Trials? What's Next Post Masterson? Interview with P.I. Jeffrey Augustine
episodes.description: In the wake of the Danny Masterson trial, there are still a lot of headaches on the horizon for the Church of Scientology. Jeffrey Augustine, a noted private investigator who has helped expose the church's shady financial practices, gives us a rundown. We'll also talk about my experience as a journalist who got fired for trying to expose the truth about Scientology.
